incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backbone offer. This may temporarily affect Latency. Start time : 10/04/2025 22:00 UTC End time : 10/04/2025 23:00 UTC Service impact : Latency is expected to occur for 1 hour during the operation. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment located in Paris. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 17/04/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 17/04/2025 18:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. Thank you for your understanding.

Start time : 10/04/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 11/04/2025 07:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be temporarily unavailable during 10 minutes for the racks specified bellow : S2-5X-02-05A S2-5X-02-05B S2-5X-02-08B S2-5X-02-09B IPMI network will be unavailable during the maintenance for the racks specified bellow : S2-5X-02-06B S2-5X-02-07A S2-5X-02-07B S2-5X-02-08B S2-5X-02-09B S2-5X-02-10A Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance.
